title: Did the CDC do the CAVID-19 rapid upgrade to the 6% death? Is it legit?
subtitle: A rumor that reduces the risk of the deadly virus has been promoted by a group of people, including President Donald Trump of the United States.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The CDC's mortality statistics were "combined quietly" in summer 2020 to show that only 6 per cent of previously reported deaths were actually due to the Corona virus, while the remaining 94 per cent died due to pre-existing health conditions.
